entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Kananaskis (Nakiska Ridgetop)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Flurries beginning late this evening. Snow level 2000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
